channel.title: Netora. Now a tekkit Server
channel.description:
[url=http://minecraft-server-list.com/server/88507/][img]http://minecraft-server-list.com/server/logo/88507.png[/img][/url] or play.netoracraft.com notch.netoracraft.com A.netoracraft.com play2-6.netoracraft.com
40 cookies in first 2 days.
Fast Vps will very little lag Donation ranks Factions neat areas Skylands/aether Tekkit lands
Rules:
DO NOT GRIEF
[s]DO NOT LURE[/s] Luring now alowed.
DO NOT USE HACKING PROGRAMS OR MODS (minimap allowed)
NO XRAY
NO SPAMMING
Do not warp out of /warp pvp in combat. this is punishable by you dying anyway. in lava... where commands are disabled :)
Rule Exceptions
You are however allowed to teleport out of pvp if the other person is risking nothing, and only wants to break your armor.
You are however allowed to steal from inactive players.
Please sign up on the website so we can keep better care of our users.
thank you.

item.title: Netora. Now a tekkit Server
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

You’ve made retarded comments in two different topics and now you’re getting mad because I corrected you. I’m not “one-upping” anyone, you’re just taking me too seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: Netora. Now a tekkit Server
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:12, topic:441673”]I feel I have the responsibility to correct wrong information, I’m not trying to one-up anyone.

There’s no such thing as “no lag”. Ever. Unless you make some massive discovery in quantum computing, there will always be a measurable latency (even when connecting from the host machine). If you’re going to define how much lag a server has you should give some latency figures from some example locations.[/quote]
no its not that you have a responsibility… your trying to one up EVERYONE, and you just come on to bitch and call people mean things… thats not even nice at all… i think your becomming the new ACF… and its really starting to annoy me…

so please leave me the fuck alone…

Read full topic

item.title: Netora. Now a tekkit Server
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I feel I have the responsibility to correct wrong information, I’m not trying to one-up anyone.

There’s no such thing as “no lag”. Ever. Unless you make some massive discovery in quantum computing, there will always be a measurable latency (even when connecting from the host machine). If you’re going to define how much lag a server has you should give some latency figures from some example locations.

Read full topic

item.title: Netora. Now a tekkit Server
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

xx matty xx:

no such thing as ‘no lag’!

depends on your computer and how close you are to the server…
i am in canada while the machine is in united states by kracky lol.

and i have not been lagging on the server. neither has my friend from egypt.
so its the closest to “no lag” you could get.

and would you stop trying to “one up” everyone… its really getting on my nerves…

Read full topic
